name: triggerBuild
description: create a json file to contain current version details and push it to git repository to trigger builds

name: locals
description: link dependencies from local filesystem into current application node_modules.

name: internals
description: install internal dependencies from a behind-proxy repository.

name: buildVersion
description: update buildVersion for application (usually before build).

name: pkgVersion
description: update version in package.json for npm libraries.

name: cleanupBuild
description: cleanup dist directory for npm libraries based on patterns provided.

name: prepack
description: ensure npm pack commands ran in root actually packs dist directory.

name: postpack
description: undo changes done by prepack command.
